name: WarpTimeSeriesImageMultiTransform
description: WarpTimeSeriesImageMultiTransform is a tool used to apply a series of transformations to a time series image, either forward or reverse, using affine transforms and warps.

inputs.name: Image Dimension
inputs.description: The dimensionality of the input images (3D or 4D).

inputs.name: Moving Image
inputs.description: The image to which the transformation will be applied. It can be a 3D image with vector voxels or a 4D image with scalar voxels.

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The output image after transformation. It is resampled based on the reference image domain.

inputs.name: Reference Image
inputs.description: The reference image that defines the space into which the input image will be warped.

inputs.name: Transforms
inputs.description: A list of transformation files, such as affine transformation matrices and warps, applied in sequence.

inputs.name: Interpolation
inputs.description: Specifies the type of interpolation to use: Nearest Neighbor or 3rd order B-Spline.

output-files.name: Output Image
output-files.description: The transformed image that is saved as output.

author: ANTs Developers
